column1: Little Goat Diner////Went with a few friends for brunch to this place. There is an hour wait. About food
column2: didn't find anything special...the food was mediocre.. I ordered corn beef hash. It came out so greasy
column5: it was barely cooked! Â My friend got "the little pig went to china" she said it was decent! It's ok for an experience
column6: but don't think I'll go back! Left this place still hungry and not happy! Definitely there are better places than "little goat".
